name: Defender
summary:
Defender is an arcade video game developed and released by Williams Electronics in 1981. The game is set on an unnamed planet where the player must defeat waves of invading aliens while protecting astronauts. Development was led by Eugene Jarvis, a pinball programmer at Williams; Defender was Jarvis' first video game project and drew inspiration from Space Invaders and Asteroids.

Defender是由Williams Electronics在1980年街机平台制作并发行的飞行射击游戏。游戏的背景是在一个虚构的行星上，玩家必须击败潮水般入侵的外星人，并保护宇航员的安全。游戏的开发由 Eugene Jarvis主导，他是WE公司一个制作弹球游戏的程序师。这款游戏是他第一个开发的游戏，他在开发中借鉴了游戏Space Invaders 和 Asteroids的一些设计。
